item.title: Why Hedge Fund Elliott Bet $4B on Pepsi and Sees Over 50% Upside
item.description: A key hedge fund is betting billions on PepsiCo, a stock with a long streak of underperformance. The fund believes its plan can revitalize the sleepin...

item.title: Microsoft’s AI Push Beyond OpenAI Could Drive Next Breakout
item.description: Microsoft is reducing reliance on OpenAI by launching its own AI models, a move that could boost margins, expand Azure, and lock in enterprise clients

item.title: Here's What Separates Oklo From the Rest of the Nuclear Startups
item.description: Nuclear stocks are flying high this year. But one pre-revenue startup backed by OpenAI’s Sam Altman could produce enormous gains over the long-term.

item.title: Why Marvell’s 19% Drop Could Be a Big Buy-the-Dip Opportunity
item.description: After Marvell's huge post-earnings fall, Wall Street analysts now see 40% upside in shares. The stock's drop may have been a significant overreaction.

item.title: Daqo New Energy: Solar Monopoly Launches $100M Buyback
item.description: Daqo New Energy is buying back $100 million of its own stock, a significant amount of its market capitalization in a sign that the bottom might be in.
